item.description: This Friday night, August 24th, come on out and catch The Bernadettes as we host a farewell booty shakin' shindig over at Leon's, located at501 Long Wharf Dr., New Haven, CT, their phone: (203) 562-5366. As many have you probably know, Leon's will be closing their doors and relocating after the Labor Day weekend...the new place is considerably smaller and they won't be hosting live music there on a regular basis.  Leon's was one of the hottest dance clubs for party people in the Elm City and will be missed...a great place, located right on the New Haven waterfront, beautiful harborside views, open air dining...and of course, some of tastiest Italian dishes to be served in Elm City!!!  Add a nice dance floor and lively, hip party vibe...grab your dancing shoes and head on out to Leon's as we say goodbye and rock the house this Friday night...don't miss it!!!  We also will be celebrating a birthday in the band...may get crazy!!!  Showtime at 9:00 PM, reservations or an early arrival recommended as we usually pull in some pretty big crowds at our Leon's shows!  For directions and info, visit their website at: http://www.leonsrestaurant.com/

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: The Bernadette's @ Leon's
